description: “So you look like a burly mountain man!” Burke said he had no problem getting naked and jerking off but he didn’t want to shave his beard. “You know, I’ve been known to chop some wood and wear flannel!” He joked. We a good time getting to know Burke a bit. He’s from the east coast but just moved out to the west coast. “I’ve always wanted to pack my begs and travel so I just recently bought a one way plane ticket and went for it!” “Are you glad you did it?” I asked “Hell yeah…have you ever seen an east coast winter. Fuck that!” Burke got really comfortable really quick and started to tease the camera guys a little bit. “I could use some help in here, I can’t reach my back…or balls!” He said to the camera guys while he took a shower. ‘You are such a flirt!” Burke just smiled and laughed. “Yeah, I know!”
title: Burke
